THE RETURN OF CLASSIC ACTION RPG

org.swarmware.android.orbs.knockoff.all.title: Orbs.Knockoff FULL
org.swarmware.android.orbs.knockoff.all.description:
Orbs.Knockoff FULL.  61 challenging levels. Random mode with infinite possibilities.  It's like aliens reinvented pool.  

Takes billiards to another level.

Think you are the best Orbs.Knockoff player out there?  Prove it via Twitter

*** Please RATE ***

TRY LITE for FREE!

Ver 1.9: New Framework. Bonus Level!

com.pikpok.fks.title: Flick Kick Football
com.pikpok.fks.description:
The #1 App store sensation, Flick Kick Football, has arrived for Android! 

Set in the Golden Age of Football, do you have what it takes to find the net? Curve, lob, drive and shoot the ball from all over the pitch with the flick of your finger! 
 
-Multiple Game Modes to chose from!
-Feint Leaderboards and Achievements!

com.pikpok.kikfg.title: Flick Kick Field Goal
com.pikpok.kikfg.description:
The #1 Field Goal Kicking App! An instant classic and EXTREMELY addictive!

Have you got what it takes to score the match winning kick? 

Control your kicks with the flick of your finger.

Account for 360 degree wind!

Multiple Game Modes

Feint Leaderboards and Achievements

com.sgg.sp.title: Shopper's Paradise
com.sgg.sp.description:
ON SALE 25% OFF! Introductory offer, ends soon. 
Build your retail empire within days and put your competitors out of business! An excellent mix of strategy and time management.

11 upgradeable store types
20 maps of various complexity
up to 4 goals to achieve before the deadline
3 difficulty levels

1.0.8 bug fixes

com.requiem.boxing.title: Beatdown Boxing
com.requiem.boxing.description: Use your skills to dodge, jab and brawl with intense first-person arcade-style boxing. Start in the amateur circuit and work your way up to pro, meeting 15 opponents along the way. Max out your hits and try for a super KO-combo. You have not seen boxing action like this on your phone before!

com.camelgames.shootu.title: Shoot U!
com.camelgames.shootu.description:
Hand-drawing style physics game. All you need to do is shooting the little guy to hit the star, simple? We’ll see who is on the global ranking board
New feature! Put your friends (or your enemies) face on a ragdoll by importing images from your SD card.

90 levels

UPDATE
Minor bugs fixed

com.fridgecat.android.atilt.title: aTilt 3D Labyrinth
com.fridgecat.android.atilt.description:
Now also available as a free ad-supported game: aTilt 3D Labyrinth Free!

aTilt is a labyrinth maze game with an emphasis on realistic physics, 3D graphics, and a top-notch gaming experience. There are 258 levels included, and you can create and share your own levels online!

10/26/2010 - Added new maps with rotating walls

com.sgg.archipelago.title: Archipelago
com.sgg.archipelago.description:
Addictive real-time strategy game. Easy to learn! Grow and deploy your forces to capture islands of a tropical archipelago.

Version 2 was redesigned from the ground up.  New features:
- multiple AI players
- improved AI
- you can play against a team of computer players
- you can have computer players on your team

com.beepstreet.speedx.title: Speedx 3D
com.beepstreet.speedx.description:

Speedx delivers a stunning accelerometer-controlled tunnel experience. Test your reflex in an ultimate speed challenge with smooth 3D graphic. Global leaderboard and achievements with Feint.

Not compatibile with HTC Wildfire

Check our new games - Prism and JellyBalls

com.galcon.igalcon.title: Galcon
com.galcon.igalcon.description:
"Galcon is a must. It's what you might call 'Space Risk In Real-Time.'" - Penny Arcade

Galcon is an awesome high-paced multi-player galactic action-strategy game.  Send swarms of ships to defeat enemy planets and conquer the universe!

Online multi-player game lets you battle 1000's of players worldwide!

net.pierrox.mini_golfoid.ext_course.mini.title: Mini Golf'Oid - "Mini-Golf"
net.pierrox.mini_golfoid.ext_course.mini.description:

com.momojo.rombud.title: Rom Buddy
com.momojo.rombud.description:
Use Rom Buddy to download Roms for all your favorite systems for use on popular emulator Apps like nesoid, gameboid, gensoid,and Mojo GBA,etc.Gameboy Advance and Color,Nintendo, Super Nintendo,Genesis,Game Gear, master system,MAME,Amiga and Capcom. Added Atari! Screenshots and ratings.

com.jjcgames.android.airhockey.title: Air Hockey
com.jjcgames.android.airhockey.description:

- Smooth graphics

com.ellismarkov.bball.title: BasketBall
com.ellismarkov.bball.description:

com.com2us.caligo.description:

se.illusionlabs.labyrinth.full.title: Labyrinth
se.illusionlabs.labyrinth.full.description:

- 50 official levels
- Android 2.2 compatibility
- Bug fixes

com.herocraft.game.farmfrenzy1_5.title: Farm Frenzy (for Android 1.5)
com.herocraft.game.farmfrenzy1_5.description:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to run your own fully working farm?  Looking after chickens, sheep and cows, producing cakes, wool, butter and cheese.  If you fancy giving it a go without having to get up at the crack of dawn every day Farm Frenzy is the game for you!

com.cyxb.fishin2go.title: Fishin' 2 Go (FULL)
com.cyxb.fishin2go.description:

com.fgol.sharkeu.title: Hungry Shark [EU]
com.fgol.sharkeu.description:
Chomp your way to the top of the food chain in this fast-paced aquatic eat 'em-up. Binge on the beach, trawl the depths and raid the Antarctic to satisfy your appetite. Pick-up-and-play fun with beat-your-buddies online hiscores. Feeling peckish?

iPhone: #1 in 15+ Countries. 500,000+ Paid Downloads!

FGOM is FGOL in the EU

com.hg.gunsandglory.title: Guns'n'Glory
com.hg.gunsandglory.description:
Play the best award winning Wild West tower defense game on Android!

FULL FEATURED and AD-FREE (no ads)!

http://goo.gl/fnNu

com.fdp.nosecandy.title: Nose Candy

com.kb.Carrom3DFull.title: Pool Break Pro

com.polarbit.ragingthunder.title: Raging Thunder
com.polarbit.ragingthunder.description: Raging Thunder is a gut-churning, tyre burning racer giving you control over the most extreme muscle cars in the world! Race against time, CPU controlled opponents or up to other speed addicts.

com.androidemu.nes.title: Nesoid (NES emulator)
com.androidemu.nes.description:
Nesoid is the famous NES/FC emulator for Android.

* Context menu in ROM list
* [O] In-between buttons press for A&B
- Very fast with sound
- Customizable on-screen keypad
- Save states
- Net-play (Bluetooth/WiFi)
- Cheats
- Support Vs. System ROMs
- Light gun

coolcherrytrees.games.reactor4.title: 4 Player Reactor
coolcherrytrees.games.reactor4.description:
The fastest multi-player reaction game!
Up to 4 players battle simultaneously for the best reaction in 20 frantic modes:
- Countdown hits zero
- Find Smiley
- Match Pairs
- 4 in a Line
- Color \u003d Word
and many more!

Buy with PayPal possible via 2 Player Reactor!

Play it on easy to insane.

Not convinced? Read the comments!

com.gamevil.bs2010.title: Baseball Superstars® 2010
com.gamevil.bs2010.description:
The 2010 edition of Baseball Superstars returns with enhanced additional features and modes!

Player and team customization elements make a grand return, so batter up and transform your rookie into a superstar!

Enjoy all the hype of the post season, right in the palm of your hands. On sale for $4.99!

com.zodttd.psx.title: psx4droid (PSX Emulator)
com.zodttd.psx.description:
psx4droid, the Sony Playstation PSX/PS1 emulator for fast Androids.

Changelog v1.7: http://tl.gd/6lap6q
Guide/FAQ: http://tl.gd/6k1rjk

Fast & feature packed:
- Uses formats BIN,ISO,IMG,PBP,Z,ZNX, and Eboot
- WiiMote controller
- Trackball dpad
- Memory card & save states
- Virtual control overlay
- Scaling modes
Thanks!

com.dcsoft.games.xgalagad.title: XGalaxy - SALE!
com.dcsoft.games.xgalagad.description:
!! ON SALE !!

Relive the 80's with this classic arcade/action style space shooter. XGalaxy for Android is a space shooter with global high scores, and increasingly difficult gameplay as you clear each screen. Collect powerups, to gain additional firepower.

* New leaderboards, level soundtrack!!

KW: Galaga

com.geniteam.gangwars.paid10rp.title: Gang Wars - 10 Respect Points
com.geniteam.gangwars.paid10rp.description:
*HALLOWEEN EDITION!!
*Climb to the top on leaderboard by doing halloween jobs and buying halloween items!

Unleash the desire to become Mafia Don by bringing others into your mob and spreading your influence throughout the world. You can also fight back and view gang size in this version

net.hexage.radiant.hd.title: Radiant HD
net.hexage.radiant.hd.description:
Radiant HD is optimized for hi-res devices (eg. Galaxy Tab,Droid,Desire,Nexus,EVO).

Take your stand against the alien horde in a pure arcade/action space shooter.

Cut through hundreds of creeps to face giant monsters in unique bossfights. Collect special weapons and power-ups, upgrade your ship and save your homeworld!

com.snctln.game.BreakTheBlocksFull.title: BreakTheBlocks Full
com.snctln.game.BreakTheBlocksFull.description:
Simple ball, paddle, and block game

* Performance updates

Move your paddle from side to control the ball and break all of the blocks

This full version has a total of 50 levels.

Try the free "Lite" version for 10 levels.

Please let me know of any problems that you have.

com.requiem.armoredStrike.title: Armored Strike Online
com.requiem.armoredStrike.description:
Classic tank warfare with a modern touch and extreme firepower! Play online now!

Genre: Worms, Scorched Earth, iShoot.

7 Vehicles, 31 Weapons, 9 Terrains, 3 CPU AIs, 5 Wind Settings, 75 Achievements.

After initial purchase, ALL updates are *FREE*!

Experience can now be gained offline!

android.uniwar.title: UniWar
android.uniwar.description:
The Best Online Multiplayer Turn-Based Strategy Game! A blend between Starcraft and Advanced war. Over 1 million games played!!! 

- 3 races, 24 units
- 50+ maps with up to 8 players
- Play up to 20 games at once
- Team play: 2v2,3v3,4v4
- Campaign Mode: 21 missions
- Worldwide Global Ladder
- In-game chat
- Music, SoundFX

com.dvidearts.crusadeofdestiny.title: Crusade Of Destiny
com.dvidearts.crusadeofdestiny.description:
First ever full scale 3D RPG for Android!
In a time of magic and dragons, become the hero you were meant to be and embark on the crusade of your destiny. Everything you expect in a solid RPG delivered in stunning 3D!

-SD Card Support
-EVO sound works with Froyo 2.2 update
-Hero,Eris,Moment not yet compatible

com.artofbytes.gravedefence.title: GRave Defense Gold
com.artofbytes.gravedefence.description:
The Tower Defense with an addictive gameplay and an excellent graphics! In the game You will find lots of upgradeable weapons, maps and monsters!Develop your own strategy to Win!
New in 1.3.0:
-App2SD by default!
-Balance and art improvement-levels 3,9,11!
Big update is coming next week!With Achievements and new Soundtrack!

com.mstream.meteorfull.title: Meteor Brick Breaker
com.mstream.meteorfull.description:
Beautiful space breakout with shoot'em up elements.

Break the blocks saving your rocket from enemy missiles. 120 levels, over 60 types of blocks, hostile robots, various balls, weapons and power-ups.

We fixed resume issues, added trackball sensitivity, fixed media sound issues

1.6.1 SD install on 2.2

com.camelgames.blowup.title: Blow Up
com.camelgames.blowup.description:
Flatten the buildings! You have a certain amount of bombs in different sizes, with the ability to place them on timer delay. Watch the building sway and fall with real physics; even more, blow the panda up...

90 levels

CM6, please flash the newest google apps

UPDATE
Crash fixing

org.lukeallen.bomberfull.title: Atomic Bomber Full
org.lukeallen.bomberfull.description:
Fly a NATO ground-attack fighter to repel a Soviet invasion.

It's 1970, and the communists are invading Europe. It's your job to bomb them back to 1916. Tactical nuclear weapons are authorized-- it's gonna be fun on the bun!

In the full version:
-Optional onscreen joystick
-Keep upgrades on death
-Ad-free

com.molodev.galaxirstar.title: GalaxIR Star
com.molodev.galaxirstar.description:
The full version of GalaxIR.

More features for more fun !

Meryodev@gmail.com

com.polarbit.RecklessRacing.title: Reckless Racing
com.polarbit.RecklessRacing.description: THE DIRT-ROAD RACER YOU’VE BEEN WAITING FOR! Reckless Racing combines the finest in traditional top-down racing gameplay with state-of-the-art graphic environments. Skid, slip, and slide with precision controls, and challenge friends in online multiplayer modes. Hold on tight and get ready to go! Yeehaw!

com.concretesoftware.pba2_mcg.title: PBA® Bowling 2
com.concretesoftware.pba2_mcg.description: The biggest name in bowling, PBA®, brings internationally recognized players, such as Walter Ray Williams Jr., and locations, including newly added Detroit, from the Lumber Liquidators PBA Tour directly to your device! Play against your favorite PBA stars or friends!

com.tgb.missdroid.paid40fp.title: Miss Droid World - 40 FP
com.tgb.missdroid.paid40fp.description:
WE ARE CELEBRATING MISS WORLD!!
Vote for your favorite Miss Droid Contestant and earn free gifts!
Come and support girls competing for the "Miss Droid" competition. Gear up for the ultimate “Miss Droid fantasy game and become a diva. Compete to win Miss Droid World title.
n this version you get 40 extra fashion points!

com.gamevil.bs09.title: Baseball Superstars®
com.gamevil.bs09.description:
Get ready to batter up in Baseball Superstars 2009! Choose from a list of 10 teams and battle it out on the field in America's exciting pastime.
Create and customize your pitcher and batter, and live the life of a major leaguer!
It's time to step up to the plate and become the next superstar!

com.halfbrick.fruitninja.title: Fruit Ninja
com.halfbrick.fruitninja.description:
The worldwide smash hit iPhone game Fruit Ninja has now arrived for Android! Over 2 million copies sold, and counting!

-Fixed crash / Force Close issues with Android 1.6

com.androidemu.gba.title: GameBoid (GBA Emulator)
com.androidemu.gba.description:
GameBoid is the famous GameBoy Advance emulator for Android.

* Context menu in ROM list
* [O] GBA save type
* Support zipped BIOS
* Key mappings for TL+TR
- Run most games at full speed
- Customizable on-screen keypad
- Save states
- Cheats
- Fast-forward (turbo)
- Multiple key profiles
- Screen upside-down

com.realarcade.DOJ.description:
LIMITED TIME SALE! $.99 until November 17th! Act Now!

UPDATE IS HERE! New Themes! Bugs Fixed!

com.fgol.shark.description:
Chomp your way to the top of the food chain in this fast-paced aquatic eat 'em-up. Binge on the beach, trawl the depths and raid the Antarctic to satisfy your appetite. Pick-up-and-play fun with beat-your-buddies online hiscores. Feeling peckish?

smpxg.crystallight.title: Crystallight Defense
smpxg.crystallight.description: A "tower defense" game with online ratings and hours of exciting gameplay. Mix crystals and force waves, use obstacles and mines! Pass 40 levels in Campaign and defeat Mech Lord or play in Battle mode.

com.herocraft.game.farmfrenzy.title: Farm Frenzy
com.herocraft.game.farmfrenzy.description: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to run your own fully working farm?  Looking after chickens, sheep and cows, producing cakes, wool, butter and cheese.  If you fancy giving it a go without having to get up at the crack of dawn every day Farm Frenzy is the game for you!

com.camelgames.hyperjump.title: Hyper Jump
com.camelgames.hyperjump.description:
It's a fast-pace and super addictive time killer with funny characters and fantastic multi-layered backdrops. Tilt your phone to collect coins, grab power ups, and dodge monsters.

**ATTENTION**
Install and launch "Pack for Hyper Jump" to unleash more scenes and characters

UPDATE
New map!

com.SteamBirds.title: Steambirds
com.SteamBirds.description:
LIMITED TIME LAUNCH PROMO! $.99 until Nov. 19! 

"...Steambirds lies in wait to rob you of your Monday morning." --Penny Arcade

The addictive, turn-based gameplay of Flash hit "Steambirds" has arrived! Use bombs, missiles and poison gas to defeat enemy planes. This version features improved graphics and UI and new music.

com.deckeleven.windsofsteel.title: Winds of Steel
com.deckeleven.windsofsteel.description:
Experience World War II's most epic and legendary air battles in Asia and Pacific theaters on your Android mobile phone.

From the attack on Pearl Harbor, and all the way to the bombing of Tokyo, take command of 12 famous Pacific fighters and bombers in a challenging 3D game.

net.pierrox.mini_golfoid.ext_course.alph.title: Mini Golf'Oid - Alphabet #1/2

com.defensoid.title: Defensoid
com.defensoid.description:
Casual tower defense for the Android masses!

Create a destructive maze with 4 upgradeable tower types to repel the evil Oids.

Enjoy 22 different levels with 3 difficulties.  Any level can be set to have infinite enemies, allowing you to play until your defenses are overcome!

Check update details at:
www.defensoid.com

com.dcsoft.games.xgalaga2.title: XGalaxy 2
com.dcsoft.games.xgalaga2.description:

com.iauns.idemolished.description:

Chomp your way to the top of the food chain in this fast-paced aquatic eat 'em-up. Binge on the beach, trawl the depths and raid the Antarctic to satisfy your appetite. Pick-up-and-play fun with beat-your-buddies online hiscores. Feeling peckish?

com.magicwach.rdefense.title: Robo Defense
com.magicwach.rdefense.description:
Robo Defense is the ultimate portable tower defense experience.  Featuring open maps, upgrades, achievements and nice graphics.

A free version is also available (try it first!).

Update: v1.3: New "Dropper" unit that appears on difficulty level 10 and higher.  Bug Fixes.

http://lupislabs.blogspot.com

com.com2us.HB3D.title: HOMERUN BATTLE 3D
com.com2us.HB3D.description:
HOMERUN BATTLE 3D DOES! play ONLINE match up & go head-to-head against the world's best BASEBALL SLUGGERS.

- From V.1.4.0, items can be restored. (Gold ball&Records can't be restored)

** NEW ITEMS will be added in near future:)

Requires WIFI & SD Card to store 17mb of additional game data.

www.facebook.com/com2us

com.gianormousgames.towerraidersgold.title: Tower Raiders GOLD
com.gianormousgames.towerraidersgold.description:
Small Screen, Gianormous Gameplay!

For Droid, Nexus, Incredible, Evo, Etc (Large screen devices)
(Small screen users should see "Tower Raiders BLACK")

Deep gameplay, 24 unique and challenging levels.

New:
Turned copy protection off, as it is incompatible with app2sd and disabled it.
Added basic pinch-zoom.

com.lavapps.AirTrafficControl.title: Air Traffic Control
com.lavapps.AirTrafficControl.description:
As an Air Traffic Controller, your job is to direct planes to their runways without crash!

Includes 4 Game Modes and 4 Maps !

Try the free version before this one.


Please send us email reports if you have any problem with the game.

net.pierrox.mini_golfoid.ext_course.moun.title: MGOID - Mountain Paradise
net.pierrox.mini_golfoid.ext_course.moun.description:
A course full of slopes.

*** IMPORTANT : Please note that this application cannot be directly opened and will not appear in the home screen. It's purpose is only to provide a golf course for Mini Golf'Oid. Please install Mini Golf'Oid first (free).

com.androidemu.gens.title: Gensoid (SEGA Genesis Emu)
com.androidemu.gens.description:
Gensoid is the famous SEGA Genesis/MegaDrive emulator for Android.

* Game Genie support!
* Context menu in ROM list
* [O] Enable resolution change. Street fighter (and more) is now full-screen!
* Fixed in-game save
- Run most games at top speed
- Customizable on-screen keypad
- Save states
- Net-play
- Fast-forward

com.chickenbrickstudios.plox.title: Plox: Tower Defense
com.chickenbrickstudios.plox.description: Classic Tower Defense done right!  Featuring 5 maps, 9 different enemies (in over 350 waves), 4 tower types (with upgradable abilities), and "Bonus Content" which offers new maps and enemies!

net.pierrox.mini_golfoid.ext_course.hard.title: Mini Golf'Oid - Hard course
net.pierrox.mini_golfoid.ext_course.hard.description:
Hard course for Mini Golf'Oid

Reward : contains a free course for Gravity Golf !!!

Already included in the full version of Mini Golf'Oid.

*** IMPORTANT : This app. cannot be  opened and will not appear in the home screen. It provides a golf course for Mini Golf'Oid and another for Gravity Golf. Please install them first.

com.selticeapps.pool.title: Touch Pool 2D
com.selticeapps.pool.description:
Pool game Touch Pool 2D is a billiards game for your phone.

Pool Game modes vs Computer:
8 Ball,9 Ball +More
+ Includes all 6 individual pool game modes

Best pool game on the Market!
90% of ratings 4+ stars & over 10k downloads

10 fun ways to play pool in one GREAT pool game! Billiards, 8 Ball, 9 Ball pool game & more!

net.hexage.evac.hd.title: EVAC HD
net.hexage.evac.hd.description:
Optimised for hi-res devices! (Galaxy Tab,Droid,Desire,Nexus,EVO)

Run for your life through colorful neon mazes chased by ever-vigilant security forces.

Play stealthily to avoid encounters, prepare traps for your enemies, or just rush as fast as you can. 

The only way out is the way through!

- APP2SD
- 21MB download

com.beepstreet.prism.title: Prism 3D
com.beepstreet.prism.description:
Now with Feint!

A totally new game testing your alertness and reflex. Accelerometer-controlled ball bouncing off 3D tiles. Incredibly smooth graphics. 25 built-in levels. Create your own levels through a dedicated level editor. Includes the infinite mode, achievements and global highscore. 

Check Speedx and JellyBalls!!

grayfinstudios.android.minisquadron.title: MiniSquadron!
grayfinstudios.android.minisquadron.description:
MiniSquadron is a frantic arcade shooter featuring:
*Intuitive touch controls
*Stunning graphics & art
*Over 50 planes to unlock
*8 levels of intense combat
*Local Wi-fi multiplayer

#3 in AppAdvice's "Top 100 iPhone Games of All Time"

com.idreams.skyforce.title: Sky Force
com.idreams.skyforce.description:
Legendary classic arcade shooter now available for Android! 3d interactive objects, outstanding graphics, special effects, soundtrack and 100% of pure gameplay.

If you like this game please consider purchasing "Sky Force Reloaded".

v1.32 - integrated with Open Feint. Enjoy achievements and highscores!

com.hyperdevbox.exzeus.title: ExZeus Arcade
com.hyperdevbox.exzeus.description:
ExZeus unlocks the power of your recent phone.
Get your adrenaline pumping with this action packed 3D shooter
NOTE:
.for HIGH-END handset only.
.Requires WIFI & SD Card to store 57mb of additional game data

com.polarbit.rthunder2.title: Raging Thunder 2
com.polarbit.rthunder2.description:
To save file space on your device, ~20MB data will be downloaded to your SD card at 1st launch.

Performance intensive - high-end device required!

Buckle up Take on the most adrenaline pumping 3D street racer ever on a handheld platform.
Raging Thunder features stunning console quality  graphics.

ap.games.agentfull.title: Agent (Shoot the Targets)
ap.games.agentfull.description:
REQUIRES A FAST CPU!, try the demo first

11/12-SEVEN NEW MULTIPLAYER-ONLY LEVELS

WARNING:Game is very addictive & very challenging.

You are an Agent in training. Shoot the targets by tapping the screen, careful, some shoot back. Enjoy the music! (35 levels)

PLEASE RATE 5 STAR :)

PLEASE EMAIL ME WITH ANY ISSUES YOU HAVE

com.pikpok.kik.title: Flick Kick Rugby
com.pikpok.kik.description:
The #1 Rugby Conversion Kicking App! 

Will you score the game winning kick? An instant classic for real rugby fans! 

Flick Kick Rugby brings intuitive, quick to play, on the go fun.
-Control your kicks with the flick of your finger.
-Account for 360 degree wind!
-Multiple Game Modes
-Feint Leaderboards and Achievements”

namco.pacman.ce.title: PAC-MAN Championship Edition
namco.pacman.ce.description:
Next generation PAC-MAN complete with Hi-Res graphics and 6 new game modes. Race against the clock, eat the PAC pellets and avoid the speedy ghosts in all new mazes.

kw \u003d pacman ce, namco, arcade, championship

com.measuredsoftware.android.pocketracin.title: Pocket Racing
com.measuredsoftware.android.pocketracin.description:
"Pocket Racing is one of the best arcade racers on Android."   8/10 - PocketGamer.com

4.5/5 - Droidgamers.com

Old skool topdown 2D racing game with online scoreboards, race uploads & downloads. Play 8 tracks & 5 cars with different handling & a customisable car.

Lite version available too

Racing,grand,prix,race,racer

dk.logisoft.airattackfull.title: Air Attack
dk.logisoft.airattackfull.description:
The full arsenal of modern war equipment is released upon you in this breathtaking arcade game! Burn in napalm, suffocate in gas or be nailed to the ground with depleted uranium shells!

New Version: Install to sd-card and fewer permissions.

Differs from the free version in that there are no ads. Thx for your support.

com.computertimeco.minishot.android.title: Mini Shot Basketball
com.computertimeco.minishot.android.description:
Tip - Smooth toss, not flicks

Updated - Oct 22. 
New - Daily Best Classic Trophies Winners

Mini Shot is a pocket version of an arcade hoops basketball game. 

Submit High Scores on-line. 

With announcer sound effects to get you in the action. There are four play modes plus a practice mode to help you improve your game.

com.littlekillerz.legendsarcana.title: Legends Arcana
com.littlekillerz.legendsarcana.description:
Legends Arcana is an action rpg.

New in 1.31g
-Movement speed increased by agility.
-Criticals added, affected by concentration.
-Tame skill greatly improved.

-27MB will be downloaded to your sdcard.

-Forums at Legendsarcana.com.

-Email us all issues we will fix ASAP!

Tags: dungeons, dragons, hack, slash, diablo

net.hexage.radiant.title: Radiant
net.hexage.radiant.description:
Try Radiant HD if you have a hi-res device!

Take your stand against the alien horde in a pure arcade/action space shooter.

Cut through hundreds of creeps to face giant monsters in unique bossfights. Collect special weapons and power-ups, upgrade your ship and save your homeworld!

Relive the classics revamped.

com.momojo.rombud.psx.title: Rom Buddy PSX
com.momojo.rombud.psx.description: Rom Buddy PSX is the newest and best companion to psx4droid. It will find and download all your favorite playstation ROMs directly to your phone. Unzips roms for psx4droid. Get it now for a special intro price. New features are already planned!! Switch your phone to WIFI for the fastest downloads. Finds almost 900 games!!

com.androidemu.snes.title: SNesoid (SNES Emulator)
com.androidemu.snes.description:
SNesoid is the famous Super Nintendo emulator for Android.

* Context menu in ROM list
* Key mapping for TL+TR
* [O] disable resolution change on the fly
- Very fast
- Run nearly all games (Mario RPG, StarFox)
- On-screen keypad!
- Save states
- Cheats
- Net-play
- Super scope
- Fast-forward
- Screen upside-down
